short_summary: Supply and delivery of 1 Germinator cabinet to CGC's lab in Vancouver.
description: The CGC's Vancouver lab has a requirement for a Germinator cabinet to incubate samples. The contractor must supply, install and deliver the cabinet to the laboratory as per the agreed upon specifications. The cabinet must be capable of controlling temperature and humidity to a precise level, and the contractor must provide training to the laboratory staff. The contract is for one cabinet, and the total amount is estimated at approximately $20,000.
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement
## Title
**5K003-230896 Germination Cabinet - Submission**

## Official Reference
* Government Reference Number: WS4253039376
* Document Reference: 4253046655

## Tender Status
This tender has been **cancelled**.

## Tender Details
* **Publication Date**: October 18, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: November 10, 2023, 2:00 PM (EST)
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: December 1, 2023

## Procurement Overview
The Canadian Grain Commission's (CGC) Vancouver Laboratory requires the supply, installation, training, and delivery of one (1) Germinator cabinet for incubating samples in a temperature and humidity controlled environment.

## Technical Requirements
The contractor must meet the specifications listed in the Mandatory Technical Criteria as per Annex.

## Evaluation Criteria
Variations or combinations of evaluation methods may be used.

## Trade Agreements
This tender is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

## Contact Information
* Name: Willy Zumbado Diaz (SPAC/PSPC)
* Email: [willy.zumbadodiaz@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:willy.zumbadodiaz@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* Note: No phone number or fax number is provided.

## Link to Official Website
* [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17747172?extsite=MTc3NDcxNzJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17747172?extsite=MTc3NDcxNzJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)
